1.일단 이 게임은 고인물들이 뉴비들에게 친절한 게임이 아닙니다. 가지고 놀죠
2.이 게임 조금 재밌어 보인다고 가까이 하지 마세요 제가 아는 회사 형도 제가 재밌다고 추천 해줬다가 생존마들한테 당하고 바로 접었습니다.안 들어온지 60일쯤 넘어 가네요.
3. 일단 롤처럼 MMR 제도가 시급 해보입니다.1~4랭까지 빨간색 랭크인데 이 랭크 구간이 잘하는 구간입니다. 무조건 잘한다고 할 수는 없는게 플레이 시간이 많거나 하면 중간은 가기 때문에 4랭 까지는 금방 가실 수 있습니다 단 1,2랭은 진짜 잘하는 구간 진짜 많이 한 사람들은 5천 시간 넘고 그러기 때문에 상대가 안되기 때문입니다. 롤처럼 브실골...등등으로 나뉘어야 한다 생각합니다.
4.살인마는 현질을 많이 해야 올킬 및 스트레스를 줄이며 플레이가 가능합니다.
5.고인물들이 뚜벅이 살인마만 해도 잘하는데 날먹 살인마 ex(스피릿,너스,한방방구,한방토구,묘비식구,무삼식구 제가 느낀거로는 이렇게 있는거 같고 너스랑 스피릿은 진짜 개 날먹이고 스피릿은 한대 맞으면 걍 죽었다 보시면 되고 너스는 걍 망했다 보면 됩니다. 나머지 살인마들은 어느정도 밸런스는 맞춘 느낌이지만 날먹은 맞긴 합니다.
6.게임 내에 무조건 지장이 생기는 좆같은 버그가 많습니다. 요즘 트렌드로는 매튜 바위,매튜 난간이 있습니다.
7.싸가지 없는 유저들 잘하고 싶어도 좆같은 매칭 문제로 잘하는 살인마가 나오면 질 수 밖에 없습니다. 1000시간 아래면 대처 하기가 힘든데 끝나고 친추 박고 욕도 박아주는 대담함 빙의한 대단함.
8.좆같은 매칭 20랭 살인마여도 빨랭을 만나게 해주는 어메이징한 매튜식 매칭
9.걍 하지마세요..스트레스받아요 전 빠져서 못끊음

Поиграть за Эша, Пирамидаголового, Канибала из ТРБ, Майкла Майерса, Килера и Крика, Существо из Stranger Things, только ради этого игра стоит внимания.

Gra polegająca na dojeniu kasy od ludzi. Bhvr ssie gonga totalnie. Chce tylko powiedzieć,że po wejściu ludzi z epic games wywaliła się fala cheaterów i totalnych bobasów. Jedynie jak można grać w tą grę to tylko i wyłącznie z teamem. Mmr też jest świetne w tej grze. Mimo tego, że mam tyle godzin ,gdy gram survem dobiera mi 8-letnich Maciusiów co ledwo zdołali włączyć tą grę.A gdy gram killerem to nagle mi dobiera jakiś cweli,których nie da się w żaden sposób ograć. Jeszcze na dobicie gry dostajesz fajnego t-baga i click-click hahah. Co prawda to też tak robię, ale jednak no społeczność jak i bhvr ssie.Może sam wyśmienity nie jestem ,ale do chuja ileż można. O bugach i hitach to ja się może lepiej nie będę nic mówił.Ogarnijcie tą grę raz a dobrze a nie wprowadzacie ciągle jakieś uptade, które ciula dają. Gra co prawda dała mi dużo frajdy, ale jest w niej dużo niedociągnięć. Mam nadzieję, że bhvr uda wam się kiedyś załatać całkowicie te błędy. Zatem życzę powodzenia.

First played this on console. Now that it is cross platform, I think there is less chance of running into the same toxic players over and over. In the few hours I have played on PC now, I have not run into any of the notoriously obnoxious players yet. At worst, people have been AFK. Oh well, this game is just as great as it has always been. Maybe there has been a shift in the player community? Or maybe I have just gotten lucky in evading any cancerous members of the community. I took a couple months break from DBD and I am back now to try different killers and tactics. The newest expansions (Especially Silent Hill) are great. If you enjoy asymmetrical multiplayer games and you like horror aesthetics, it is hard to go wrong with Dead By Daylight. Just be sure you understand what you are getting into before you buy.

Este es un juego bastante bueno, por lo menos para mi, tiene muchos personajes variados, tanto killers como survivors, muchos logros que hacer, y muchas cosas que desbloquear, ademas que es bastante barato en epocas de ofertas

The game is basically cat and mouse where four survivors struggle to repair 5 generators while avoiding the killer. Repairing the 5 generators unlocks two main gates which the survivors must open praying to god the killer doesn't show up at the last minute and catch them. The survivors play the game in 3rd person and the killer plays in first person, The only complaint i have about DBD is the game offers an insane amount of maps but fail to give the survivors more diverse objectives to win the game. Overall the game for the most part is pretty easy to learn and balanced. Highly recommend if you're a horror genre fan and you're just looking to lay back chill while evading a killer or hacking a couple of survivors.

This game is so great.Its a 4 VS 1 horror game which 4 survivors try to escape from that area with repairing generators.Killer's goal is killing the survivors via hooking to sacrifical hooks.Game may looks like killer is unstopable when you caught as a survivor but you can actually bully the killer.There are some obstacles that survivors vault quickly,the killer is way too big so he vaults so slowly so this game balanced so great.There are some items for both survivors and killers.
Survivors
for example,flashlight.You can blind the killer with flashlight.There are more things like toolboxes and keys
Killers
all different killers has unique items such as The Shape's ''Judith's Tombstone''.You can understand all killers has different powers for example The Hag's ''Blackened Catalyst'',The Nurse's ''Spencer's Last Breath'',The Trapper's ''Bear Trap'' etc.

And Also There is a ranking system which is very nice and also the the graphics are so great.But there are some game breaking bugs and cancer players like all day camping in front of a hook type killers,always afk survivors etc.

Fun game, but extremely grindy to the point it feels like one of those free to play mobile games where if you want to progress without spending 1000s of hours of your life, you gotta pay. Sadly, there is no way to buy bloodpoints and bloodwebs are random. So even if you play for hours and earn enough to level up your character, there is no way to make sure you get the perk you've been grinding for. Bloodwebs need an overhaul and they need get rid of all the worthless offerings I'm forced to buy to complete a level. Skins are okay, but outrageously expensive (you of course can only buy skins with a special currency that costs real life money. An "epic skin" is about 10 dollars. This is game is also not well optimized for current computers and sometimes can freeze and stutter, even when my computer runs games like Overwatch perfectly. 

With all these in mind, it still is a fun and addicting game, with a good variety of killers. Survivors, once you unlock the perks you want (est. 1 month of constant playing), are basically skins, but are diverse. I do like the idea of more objectives other than gens, but why mess with the formula? Good game with some drawbacks.

I will recomment the game since i enjoy it when it works as intended but; the constant crashes, laggs and disconections that never rly get fixed just ruin the whole game. I was looking forward to this game getting it's own servers so that the killers can't lagg switch anymore, but the servers quality just made the game overall laggy and it's extremely frustrating to get bugged back into the same corner 3 times as a survivor and getting hit cuz of that, or hitting the survivor as a killer, but cuz of the laggs the survivor just magically disappears for a second and then pops up further away and without a scratch on him.
